metadata.title: Maha Lycopene - Professional Fighter
metadata.description: Official website of professional fighter Maha Lycopene

profile.title: Fighter Profile
profile.name: Name
profile.fighterName: Maha Lycopene (マハー・リコピン)
profile.bioContent: Maha Lycopene is a professional fighter known for explosive striking and relentless determination. With years of training in multiple martial arts disciplines, Maha combines technical precision with raw power to dominate the competition.
